snippet.title: An American Tail (PlayStation 2) - Full Game Walkthrough (100%) - No Commentary
snippet.description:
If you enjoyed watching this video, please leave a like and subscribe! I would very much appreciate it!

This has got to be one of the worst games I have ever played. I owned a copy and I just had to play it. To my knowledge, this is the first 100% walkthrough on YouTube and that's the only reason I'm doing this. This game could've been so much better...

I can now also play and record PlayStation 1 and 2 games (not through PlayStation 3), because I bought a special AV2HDMI MINI converter.

An American Tail (PS2) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf_e_nJLjVRc2X-gEftKzO0Z

Description: Fievel Mousekewitz and his family have left their home in Russia for a new life in America, but when a storm hits their ship bound for New York, Fievel ends up getting separated. Feeling lost, alone and very scared is only the start of Fievel's problems. New York City is teeming with big cats who love to prey on mice. Can you help Fievel defeat the feline foes and find his family in this breathtaking platform action game based on the ever popular movie.

Release Date - July 13, 2007 (Europe only)
Genre - Platformer
Platforms - PlayStation 2
Publisher - Blast! Entertainment
Developer - Data Design Interactive

My Xbox gamertag: TGG Yari
My PlayStation gamertag: ToughGamingGuyYT
My Steam:ToughGamingGuy

Wanna see more of my fantastic walkthroughs? Give it a go: https://www.youtube.com/user/ToughGamingGuy

#anamericantail #fievel #disneyps2 #playstation2
